BR_text.BRsummary: Pretrain CLI, different seeding not possible
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce the behaviour</denchmark-h>
 
 Passing a parameter to -s or --seed exposes the error. E.g. python -m spacy pretrain data/lm/de.train.jsonl de_core_news_md lm_models/de -s 42.
 The error is:
 <denchmark-code>Traceback (most recent call last):
   File "mtrand.pyx", line 678, in mtrand.RandomState.seed
 TypeError: 'float' object cannot be interpreted as an integer
 </denchmark-code>
 
 The seed parameter should be typed as int here: 
 
 
 spaCy/spacy/cli/pretrain.py
 
 
          Line 36
       in
       e703301
 
 
 
 
 
 
   seed=("Seed for random number generators", "option", "s", float), 
 
 
 
 
 
 <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
 
 <denchmark-h:h2>Info about spaCy</denchmark-h>
 
 
 spaCy version: 2.1.4
 Platform: Linux-4.9.0-9-amd64-x86_64-with-debian-9.9
 Python version: 3.7.3

comments_0.comment_text: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
